identifier.description: The unique identifier for a Geant Feed Object. It is used to sync the PuMuKIT Multimedia Object.

set.description: The provider of the Geant Feed Object. The PuMuKIT Multimedia Object will be tagged with this provider.

creationDate.description: The date set for the Geant Feed Object. Must follow the ISO 8601 standard to be parsed correctly (YYYY-MM-DD).

contributors.description: An array of contributors to the Geant Feed Object (author, actors, producer,...)

items.description: A contributor to the Geant Feed Object

role.description: The 'role' of the contributor. If the role is not found in PuMuKIT, the contributor role will be set to 'participant'

tokenBlock.description: An object containing info about the tags added to the Geant Feed Object.

taxonPaths.description: An array of tags for the Geant Feed Object

items.description: UNESCO or iTunesU subject codes. The code must be the numeric code: http://unesdoc.unesco.org/images/0008/000829/082946eb.pdf    https://help.apple.com/itunesu/sitemanager/#/itu337EEAE0-035A-4660-B53D-46A13A7721E5

languageBlocks.description: An array of language blocks with each key being the language of the elements it contains. The keys must follow the ISO 639-1 format (two characters)

items.description: A language Block for the Geant Feed Object. Contains the title, description (optional) and the keywords(optional).

rights.description: An object containing data about the copyright/license of a Geant Feed Object.

description.description: An array containing the license texts/urls. Each key corresponds to the language of the element it contains. The keys must follow the ISO 639-1 format (two characters)

expressions.description: An object containing data about the language and playable resources of a Geant Feed Object.

language.description: The language code of the Geant Feed Object playable resource. It must follow the ISO 639-1 format (two characters)

manifestations.description: An object with data about the playable resources of a Geant Feed Object.

items.description: An object that contains the url to the playable resource (Either an iframe or a file)

url.description: The url to the playable resource. The playable resource can be a file or an url valid to be embedded on an iframe.

thumbnail.description: An url to the thumbnail for the video.

duration.description: The duration of the playable resource. The format must follow the ISO 8601 extended time format ([hh]:[mm]:[ss]).

format.description: The MIME content-type of the playable resource. (E.g: video/mp4)

language.description: The language of the subtitle. It must follow the ISO 639-1 two letter code format.

url.description: The url to the VTT or SRT subtitles file.

learningObjectives.description: Educational Level of the content (HE-basic, HE-medium, PhD,â€¦). Complexity codes, TBD
